p: Two stages showed in the degradation process of neat RPUF, RPUF/Si60, and RPUF/Si80. The initial thermal temperature and T max of neat RPUF were highest among the five samples, due to the hydroxyl functionality of PPG4110 was higher than those for PTOP and PTOSi, the relative molecular weight and the cross-linking yield of neat RPUF were highest. While the maximum decomposition rate was higher than these for other samples, results reveal that the neat RPUF was degraded quickly when the temperature was higher than the initial thermal temperature.
